attributes.action: Make schools and other public institutions use open source software to save money and tech students to use other OS's and softwares exept Windows and Microsoft Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this was done, the country would save money, and we would not be so dependant on Microsoft. This would benefit the economy stopping Microsoft's monopoly and encouraging programmers to develop their skills and develop for linux and other open source softwares.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
